mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Initial construction by George F. Bodley and Henry Vaughan, 1906 to 1921. Bodley died in 1907; after which Vaughan continued project. Vaughan succeeded after his death by Boston firm Frohman, Robb and Little, 1921. Washington firm Smith Segreti Tepper took over the construction 1971 through the building's completion in 1990. Ornamental work is ongoing. [work]
